protocol_name: RNA/DNA extraction from samples of acute gastroenteritis
protocol_name_html: RNA/DNA extraction from samples of acute gastroenteritis
description: Many types of sample would be collected in outbreaks of acute gastroenteritis. Therefore we have settled this protocol to extract RNA/DNA for virus detection rapidly and effectively.
protocol_affiliation: Jinan Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jinan, China

authors_list.name: Hengyun Guan
authors_list.affiliation: Jinan Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jinan, China

authors_list.name: Chunrong Wang
authors_list.affiliation: Jinan Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jinan, China

authors_list.name: Lanzheng Liu
authors_list.affiliation: Jinan Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jinan, China

authors_list.name: Guoliang Yang
authors_list.affiliation: Jinan Center for Disease Control and Prevention, Jinan, China

status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working.

components.data:
1. Add 2.0g stool to 1.0ml phosphate buffer saline (with Mg2+ and Ca2+) in one 1.5ml Eppendorf tube with 6-8 particles of ceramic beads.
  2. Vortex for 2×20 sec at 4000rpm at room temperature.
  3. Centrifuge at 8000 rpm for 10 min at 4℃.
  4. Collect the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
1. Add 2.0g stool to 1.0ml phosphate buffer saline (with Mg2+ and Ca2+) in one 1.5ml Eppendorf tube with 6-8 particles of ceramic beads.
  2. Vortex for 2×20 sec at 4000rpm at room temperature.
  3. Centrifuge at 8000 rpm for 10 min at 4℃.
  4. Collect the supernatant.

components.data:
5. Throat swabs or environmental surface swabs were stored in Hank’s solution.

6. Vortex for 40 sec at 4000rpm at room temperature.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
5. Throat swabs or environmental surface swabs were stored in Hank’s solution.

6. Vortex for 40 sec at 4000rpm at room temperature.

components.data:
7. Add 15ml contaminated water to centrifugal filter (Merck Millipore Ltd., Ireland).

8. Centrifuge at 8000rpm for 5min at 4℃.

9. Repeat step 8 for three times.

10. Collect the supernatant.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
7. Add 15ml contaminated water to centrifugal filter (Merck Millipore Ltd., Ireland).

8. Centrifuge at 8000rpm for 5min at 4℃.

9. Repeat step 8 for three times.

10. Collect the supernatant.

components.data:
11. Add each above 200ul supernatant in sample cartridge to extract RNA/DNA followed the manufacturer’s instructions (MagNA Pure LC Total Nucleic Acid Isolation Kit, Roche, Germany).

12. RNA/DNA was suspended in 50ul of elution buffer.

13. RNA/DNA was amplified immediately or stored at −80℃.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
11. Add each above 200ul supernatant in sample cartridge to extract RNA/DNA followed the manufacturer’s instructions (MagNA Pure LC Total Nucleic Acid Isolation Kit, Roche, Germany).

12. RNA/DNA was suspended in 50ul of elution buffer.

13. RNA/DNA was amplified immediately or stored at −80℃.
